t: Direct-to-Consumer Brands on Amazon: Pros, Cons & How to Sell Successfully
s: April 4, 2023 - Like the name implies, direct-to consumer brands sell their products directly to their customers. This is achieved through their own website, and/or their own physical storefront. In other words, you won’t find DTC brands in retail stores like Walmart or Target.

t: Amazon is 'working directly with Nike to source their products,' according to an email to sellers
s: 2 weeks ago - Amazon said in an email to some sellers that it has a wholesale relationship with Nike, marking a reversal of an earlier decision from Nike.
